name: User views the issued credential in the EUDI Wallet
scenarioId: android/Issuing-Support_for_credential_offer-Issuer_initiated_scenario_25/Issuing-Support_for_credential_offer-Issuer_initiated_scenario_85/credentialOfferSameDevice:User views the issued credential in the EUDI Wallet

testSteps.description: Given the user sees a success message in the EUDI Wallet app
When the user presses the CONTINUE button
Then the new document is presented in the EUDI Wallet dashboard screen

userStory.storyName: Credential issuance process for the same device
userStory.displayName: Credential issuance process for the same device
userStory.narrative:
As a user of the issuer service
  I want to be able to issue a credential
  So that it can be securely added to my EUDI Wallet

title: User views the issued credential in the EUDI Wallet
